title: Who is the most talented KPOP artist in your opinion? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are SO MANY. If an idol wasn’t exceptional in vocals but had skills in engineering, would that idol still be considered talented? Instead of saying who I think is the best, let’s just appreciate these idols with talent. This is in no particular order. Min Yoongi (Suga): Genius lyricist and composer, plays piano, hands down one of the best idol rappers out there. Agust D 'Agust D' MVJung Hoseok (J-Hope): Seriously one of the most talented people out there, can sing, rap, dance and compose…what a legend. Boys Meet Evil-Jhope Solo DanceKim Taeyeon: An actual vocal goddess, eats albums for her meals, produces legendary bops every time TAEYEON 태연_Comeback Stage 'Fine'_KBS MUSIC BANK_2017.03.03Do Kyungsoo (D.O.): King of singing and acting, give my son a solo R&B album EXOPLANET #1 - THE LOST PLANET D.O. SOLO 《Tell Me What Is Love》Lee Jieun (IU): A best-selling vocalist that can sing, rap, song write, and act, my favourite female soloist! Here’s a video of her slaying even in 2014 【TVPP】IU - Good Day, 아이유 - 좋은 날 @ Comeback Stage, Show Music core LiveZhang Yixing (Lay): Singer, dancer, producer, composer, actor, invented talent LAY 레이_what U need?_Music VideoKim Kibum (Key): A talented rapper and singer, not only talented in performing but also fashion and design! SHINee Key - Born To Shine - Tokyo Dome soloKang Seulgi: Amazing dancer, an oustanding vocalist, probably invented performing in her past life 【TVPP】SEULGI(Red Velvet)-Turning the Pages of Memories, 슬기(레드벨벳)-추억의 책장을 넘기면@King Of Masked SingerPark Choa: She’s so talented, let her have a solo debut please, I want her to sing me to sleep AOA 초아 & 유희열 '2015 그런가 봐요' ♪ 슈가맨 3회Lee Jihoon (Woozi): So multi-talented, producer, composer, singer, dancer, so dedicated and hardworking SIMPLE ( live ) - Woozi ( SEVENTEEN ) Solo stage " Boys Wish " Encore concertShin Jimin: Could probably win a rap battle in her sleep, not only does she rap but she can sing, dance, and compose [Unpretty Rapstar / NO CUT] ep.07: Jimin(지민) - ′Puss′(feat.Iron 아이언) @Semi-FinalPark Chanyeol: Can rap and sing, plays piano and guitar, composes and produces, please notice him 151010 EXO Chanyeol - All of MePark Sunyoung (Luna): A vocal and dancing queen, legendary, deserves way more attention and appreciation LUNA.Free Somebody(Live)Park Jimin: An incredible dancer of many styles, the most pure and angelic voice 161229 | Jimin LIE Solo Stage at KBS Gayo Daechukje [LIVE]Kwon Soonyoung (Hoshi): Too talented for this world, amazing singer, incredible dancer and choreographer [fancam] 151108 세븐틴 미니팬미팅 Hoshi dance 'Strawberry Bubblegum'Kim Namjoon (Rap Monster): A rapper, composer, singer, AND producer, true king, stop hating on him he literally did nothing wrong Rap Monster 'Do You' MVLee Sunmi: Talented both instrumentally and vocally, her solo stages shook the world [선미] - 24시간이 모자라 @인기가요 inkigayo 130825Park Jihyo: An amazing lead vocal and leader, trained for TEN years, so hardworking [King of masked singer] 복면가왕 - 'You hold me, little ghost' Identity 20160724Jeon Jungkook: This wouldn’t be a proper post if I didn’t put him on here, outstanding vocalist, excellent dancer, and even raps! At only the age of 19!! 170218 THE WINGS BEGIN / 정국 직캠 JUNGKOOK FOCUSBoA: Queen of Kpop I don’t make the rules y’all, brilliant vocalist, dancer, actress, composer and producer Shattered (Live) ~ BoA ~ Sub EspañolThere are so many more that are talented, but it took me a while to make this xD I can take requests to add idols on here if there are any.

Of those I am familiar with, there are a handful. I tend to put the most weight on: vocals, followed byskill in musical instruments,composition and production,dancing,variety/hosting/radio, andacting, followed byanything else they seem to be good at.Park Hyo Shin (1, 3, 2)Super Junior’s Cho Kyuhyun (he goes by just Kyuhun for solo career) (1, 4, 5)EXO’s Park Chanyeol (2, 3, 1 for timbre and pitch, although his vocal technique is better for rap than other types, with very good competence in 4/5/6)EXO’s Do Kyungsoo (D.O) (1, 6, all EXO members are more than reasonable with 4)A Pink’s Jung EunJi (1 for timbre and reasonable consistency, 6)(I’m sure there are more but I can’t think of them at this moment, too many) Vocally I also like Super Junior K.R.Y, EXO’s Byun Baekhyun and EXO’s Chen (Kim Jongdae). If I don’t necessarily go off pure vocal skill, I also like EXO’s Lay (2, 4, 3, with 5/6 in Mandarin, but not Korean, entertainment, his vocals are competent and generally on pitch), and members of Big Bang. Especially GD and TOP, but also Taeyang, learned production early on, and their musical composition is unique and very well done. Honestly, the same could be said of members of many Kpop groups, male and female - members are given training and opportunities in a variety of artistic mediums and entertainment avenues, from dramas, web dramas as a baby step, variety show hosting, with guesting as a baby step, the same goes for radio, etc. Only the most popular and skilled who work hard can have that premium level of success. Because I put the biggest value on vocal technique, I’m probably leaving out a lot of people with balanced talent, plus I’m not familiar with a lot of Kpop groups.
